item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 12th November
item.description:
FixMyStreet ref: 8397501.: Willow Tree 10 meters from property. Honeybourne Drive Cheltenham GL510QJ Tree situated on public footpath has been re-pollard over the years and is due maintenance. During highlands branches have been found on footpath and garden and the growth is very near the roof
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green or amber traffic light is not working problem, 12th November
item.description:
Permanent Lights out in all four directions.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Loose rocking paving slabs, 12th November
item.description:
Outside the fronts of 248 and 250 bath road. Multiple paving slaps are rocking and full of water. The BT access chambers also have broken and missing edging which has caused multiple people to trip over in the uneven pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A46, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 lights out in Francis Street, 12th November
item.description:
Recent work by National Grid has restored lighting to Langdon Road/Fairfield Parade/Naunton Crescent, however lamposts outside 18 and 14 Francis Street remain out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Francis Street, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fungus on a tree, 12th November
item.description:
O/s 10 Garden Rd, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham There is a lime tree developing fungus which is rotting the tree from inside. The tree is getting worse and will become unstable. It could do with assessing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Garden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: End off Church Lane, 12th November
item.description:
Go down church road past Green on the left and livery yard in the right (white gates)! Jeep going to the end off the road. To be fair all off the drains on church road are blocked with leaves

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Marsh Terrace, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Caravan left abandoned, 12th November
item.description:
Owner of this caravan lived in the flats they either passed away or were evicted. It has been there for months and needs to be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wilkes Avenue, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover blocked, 12th November
item.description:
The drain outside no.11 Woolstone Lane is blocked. Itâ€™s a recurring problem - the cover gets blocked with mud, leaves and debris, especially as farm vehicles come up and down the lane regularly. We clear the mud ourselves whenever we can but it soon gets blocked again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Woolstone Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotten wood and dropped slabs, 12th November
item.description:
A member of the council works team came to fix some dropped slabs but was unable to do so due to a wooden plank being there. A plastic partition was installed and left 2 weeks ago.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Union Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
